title: ICC World Cup shooting up demand for flights and travel: Booking.com
description: Booking.com, the official accommodation partner for the ICC Men's Cricket World Cup in India, is experiencing a surge in demand for accommodations and flights. The India-Pakistan match in Ahmedabad has driven a significant increase in searches for accommodation, with a 1,550% rise compared to last year. Ahmedabad has also become the second-highest searched route for flights on October 13 and 14.
